snippet: Gen. John R. Allen apologized to surviving family members in Afghanistan, the first admission by coalition forces that the strike on Wednesday had killed civilians.
abstract: Gen John R Allen travels to Logar Province in Afghanistan to apologize to surviving family members for a coalition airstrike that strike killed 18 civilians.

byline.contributor: Habib Zahori contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: Gen. John R. Allen apologized to surviving family members in Afghanistan, the first admission by coalition forces that the strike on Wednesday had killed civilians.

headline.seo: Commander Flies to Afghanistan to Apologize for Coalition Airstrike

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
